section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: The agreement states that the business name of the venture is BM&V2GO, but the partnership name is Vaccines2Go. This is an in-text contradiction because it's unclear which name should be used for which purpose. Using two different names for what appears to be the same entity (the joint venture) creates ambiguity. It is not clear when to use BM&V2GO or Vaccines2Go.

section: *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal
explanation: The description of BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s duties includes HTML code, building, deploying, and maintaining technical aspects, including a database. The asterisk suggests there is more to the description of duties that should be listed, which is not described, creating an in-text contradiction because it is unclear to the full extent what the full list of requirements is.
location: Member Duties Section, under BorrowMoney.com, inc

section: JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The way this duty is described is unclear and could be interpreted in multiple ways. Is JVLS, LLC contributing $60,000 from these contracts each month? Is it a one-time contribution? Is the plus 10% in addition to the $60,000 or part of it? The description is vague and leads to multiple interpretations of the same term in different sections.
location: Member Duties Section, under JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go

section: Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD
explanation: The contribution description for BorrowMoney.com, Inc. includes 'specified Description of duty*' which indicates that a description is missing, which creates an internal contradiction.
location: Capital Contributions Section, under BorrowMoney.com, inc

section: JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: It is unclear if the $3,500,000 is considered the value of the monthly government, city, state, and or private awarded contracts. Is JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go agreeing to contribute $3,500,000 or is the value they are bringing into the joint venture worth $3,500,000. It is vague and could be interpreted in multiple ways.
location: Capital Contributions Section, under JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go

section: Any management vote required will be determined such that each Manager receives one vote carrying equal weight, unless otherwise decided by BorrowMoney.com inc.
explanation: This section states that each manager receives one vote with equal weight, unless otherwise decided by BorrowMoney.com inc. This is a contradiction because the first part of the sentence states that each manager receives one vote carrying equal weight, but BorrowMoney.com inc. has the right to change that, which means that managers do not receive one vote carrying equal weight. This creates an imbalance of power.
